WorkItem.Description:
Copy the below grid into your own project and run it. Drag the column "visible9" in between columns "visible4" and "visible5", Doing so causes columns "visible" 5, 6, 7, 8 to disappear. Dragging any other column after 5,6,7,8 disappear causes an error. It only works when the "collapsed1-5" columns are actually collapsed or hidden. You can move the collapse columns to the begging of the collection and this will still work, but if you make them the last in the collection it won't work any more. I'm guessing a measurement is getting screwed up somewhere because of the collapsed cols.
 
        <tk:DataGrid x:Name="MainDataGrid" HorizontalAlignment="Stretch" VerticalAlignment="Stretch">
            <tk:DataGrid.Columns>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible1" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible2" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible3" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="collapse1" Width="50" Visibility="Collapsed"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="collapse2" Width="50" Visibility="Collapsed"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="collapse3" Width="50" Visibility="Collapsed"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="collapse4" Width="50" Visibility="Collapsed"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="collapse5" Width="50" Visibility="Collapsed"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible4" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible5" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible6" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible7" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible8" Width="50"/>
                <tk:DataGridTextColumn Header="visible9" Width="50"/>
            </tk:DataGrid.Columns>
        </tk:DataGrid>
 
You can also get a single column to disappear by dragging "visible5" to the right of "visible9".
WorkItem.Summary: Columns Disappear after drag and drop

Comments.Message: We have filed a bug in our internal database to be fixed in a future release.
